info.title: Taxonomy API
info.description:
UiTdatabank's taxonomy API is used to programmatically retrieve lists of taxonomy terms like event types, place types, themes and facilities, as well as cities and other geographical regions.

**Authentication**

The taxonomy API requires no authentication.

**Environments**

The taxonomy API only has one environment, the production environment. Since the taxonomy terms are the same on all environments, you can also connect to this environment from your testing environment to retrieve taxonomy terms.
info.summary: Programmatically find lists of terms, cities, etc.

Term.title: Term
Term.description: A taxonomy term like an event type, place type, theme, or facility.

id.description: Unique id of the taxonomy term.

domain.description: Indicates to what domain the taxonomy term belongs.

name.description: Localized human-readable names of the term, as an object with languages as properties.

Error.title: Error
Error.description: RFC7807 error model for all publiq APIs

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

jsonPointer.description: Pointer to the erroneous request object in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) Pointer format.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
